reviews.review: Sobald Ich wieder auf Italy MM spielen kann gibts eventuell nen Daumen nach oben. Sonst geiles Game, 0/10, aber zu empfehlen!

I like the game but only if you're in a team of 5 friends. Russians are easily the worst part about this game, followed closely by random bs, such as getting jumpsniped from across the world and the following round you miss a deagle shot because of RNG. I find it unfair being able to match with a 4-stack of drunk russians and then they kick you right before you win because they find it funny.
Игра мне зашла. Но улутшение античита не помешала бы
play thıs game not 1.6 but ıt ıs so good

Counter Stirk no gud game do not play. Only russki player in me lobby all saing bad word to me. I no gud at dis game, i know that but pepel to toxic to me and dey sey dey want to fuck my mother. I no longer play dis game i have a life and kids not like all pepel playing dis game dey all kids demselves.
Multiplayer oyun oynamak istiyor, rekabet ve aksiyonu seviyorsanız başka oyun düşünemiyorum.

Very good russian cheater game
Note: You NEED to buy prime or else u get bum fucked by russian cheater
Ta gra jest spoko ale brakuje tu balansu jak deagle jest celniejszy na 30m niż awp
Nİce Game, Toxic ve hileli insanlar hariç güzel oyun
对于新手而言 真的太过不友好了
fajna gra ale za dużo rusków w tym roku pisze mature z języka rosyjskiego nie wiem kto tam jest premierem ale umiem wyru**ać ci matke na 100 sposobów
Без античита эта игра просто теряет смысл. Играбельность в 2021-2022 0 из 10.
Классный онлайн шутер, да ещё и бесплатный.
очень годный анальный секс при попадании в катку с читерами, а так игра приятная супер крутая графика ртх ртд и тд и тп нахрен не нужны

very fun game except for no prime cheaters
but if you get prime then you gonna have legit players
